about_the_game:
You play as a cube and every cube you touch attaches to you and every cube those cubes touch attach to them.

The goal is to make the shape on the ground with the colours in the correct spot.

This is the demo to give you a feel of what the full game will be like.

Keyboard(Rebindable):
  • W, A, S and D to move
  • R to restart a level
  • Scroll wheel to zoom in/out
  • ESC to open the pause menu

Controller(Not Rebinadable):
  • Left stick to move
  • B or O to restart a level
  • Shoulder buttons to zoom in/out
  • Start to open the pause menu

  • 5 Levels
  • Colour blind mode
  • Colourful levels
